value:
Even if it only lasted a year, my days
at the Officers Academy continue to
offer me strength on the battlefield.

I hope I never again find myself
away from my friends when they
are most in need...

Have you ever had an experience
that you could tell no one about?$k$pLike...visions of a girl who laughs at
you, gets angry with you, and even
cries to you? For example.

No matter the battlefield, I'm always
grateful to fight alongside allies who
are willing to lend me their strength.$k$pThe same is true for you, right?
In that case, let us train together.

I may never get answers to many of
the questions I have about my life,
but I will press on nevertheless.

Sorry for dropping in so suddenly.
I was asked to deliver greetings
from $Nf.

I'll use this power for the
greater good.
There's no turning back now.
Not my best.

Thank you. With this power,
I can keep moving forward.

My name is Byleth. I fight to
bring an end to the chaos that
has enveloped Fódlan.

Even in this world, where so many
Heroes have banded together, there
is still no end to the cycle of conflict.$k$pMy heart is heavy having seen this.$k$pHow can I hope to quench the flames
of war engulfing Fódlan? How can I
wield my blade and seek peace?$k$pEven so, I know a Hero does not
yield—a Hero fights for their dream.
Even if they may not live to see it.$k$pI still struggle to see myself as such
a Hero, but...despair is not an option
I will allow myself.$k$pI'm with you to the end. Allow me to
demonstrate how my experience
can be applied in the here and now!
はあっ
せやあっ
ああっ
しまった…
For a new tomorrow!
You cannot stop the flow of time!
I will protect you!
Here is something to believe in!
My battle ends here.
Hehe
I suppose this outfit makes me stand out. It is more ornate than I am used to.
Yes? Can I help you?
I can no longer hear Sothis's voice...
This is a place where Heroes can coexist free of conflict.
The goddess gifted me her power. I was changed by her favor.
I was looking for answers as I drifted through the flow of time... I may find what I sought here instead.
Let us work together to bring about a world of peace. My strength is yours.
Leave it to me.
Are you sure?
It is done.
